oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Allison, Alexander, 1862 January 23
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Alexander Allison, dated January 23rd, 1862. Illustrates the first page of the document. Notation: Recorded, Wills & Inventories Book, No. [19?], Page 139” for probate to the Davidson County Court. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Allison family
